0: Community_1 is located at No. 2, Longping Street, Daxing District with a rent of 30 dollars per square meter and has sports facilities and a large green area, and is conveniently located near metro, shopping malls and other amenities. Community_2 is located at No. 1 Yongwang Road, Daxing District, with a rent of 34 dollars per square meter and has a green area of more than 30% of the total land area with metro, supermarkets, shopping malls, parks, schools, restaurants and banks, and is well-equipped with amenities.
